description: Schema for submitting a computational analysis steps as a part of a workflow.
title: Analysis step

___name.description: non-unique name of the analysis step
___name.comment: non-unique for each parent analysis_step, using a naming system where the pipeline, software used, the purpose and the version of the step is described: rampage-grit-peak-calling-step-v-1
___name.title: Name

___software_used.description: The software used in this step - generally this will be a single docker container
___software_used.comment: Soo suggested a single software and use software_relation to associated containerized software
___software_used.title: Software used

___description.description: A plain text description of the analysis step.
___description.title: Description

___step_parameters.description: The parameters that are used by the analysis step - not all of which are necessarily passed to listed software
___step_parameters.title: Analysis Step Parameters

___parameter.description: the name or flag of the parameter as passed to the software
___parameter.title: Parameter name

___default_value.description: a default value for the specified parameter
___default_value.comment: can we specify either number or string?
___default_value.title: Default Value

___qa_stats_generated.description: The QA statistics generated by the analysis - document.
___qa_stats_generated.title: QA statistics

items.description: A QA statistic generated by the analysis.
items.title: QA statistic

___analysis_step_types.description: The classification of the analysis step
___analysis_step_types.title: Purpose

items.comment: But maybe not as we won't always have explicit input and/or output file types
items.title: Type

___input_file_info.description: Information about the files used as input to this analysis step
___input_file_info.title: Input File Info

___input_file_type.description: A file type used as input for the analysis.
___input_file_type.title: Input file type

___title.description: The preferred viewable name of the analysis step, likely the same as the name.
___title.title: Title

___output_file_info.description: Information about the files output from this analysis step
___output_file_info.title: Output File Info

___output_file_type.description: A file type output from the analysis step.
___output_file_type.title: Output file type

___cwl_pointer.description: Path to the CWL file for the analysis step - URL or directory path
___cwl_pointer.title: CWL Path
